title: Is This a Real Quote by Nelson Mandela?
subtitle: A quote attributed to Mandela, former president of South Africa, said: "Fools divide themselves by race, color, gender, or religion."
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: Nelson Mandela said, "Our world is not divided by race, color, gender, or religion. Our world is divided into wise people and fools. And fools divide themselves by race, color, gender, or religion."
